# onStateUpdate(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set a closure to be called when the browser’s state changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult final func onStateUpdate(_ handler: @escaping @isolated(any) (NetworkBrowser<Provider>, NetworkBrowser<Provider>.State) -> Void) -> Self
```

## Discussion

The closure may be called multiple times until the browser is cancelled.

The closure inherits the isolation domain of the caller.
